title: 10 Essential Tips for Indoor Plant Care
excerpt: Learn how to keep indoor plants healthy: watering schedules, light tips, soil, and pest prevention.
content:
Watering: Keep a consistent schedule and check soil moisture before watering.

Light: Place plants near bright, indirect light. Rotate pots monthly for even growth.

Soil & Fertilizer: Use a well‑draining soil mix. Fertilize monthly during growing season.

Pests: Inspect leaves regularly. Use gentle soaps or neem oil for common pests.
